page.title: 17SOUTH-AYR ALLOWAY LOCAL SHOP
page.content: Our local shop is{Alloway Post {Office}which is situated opposite Burns' Cottage. Burns' souvenirs, keyrings and newspapers are sold. In one corner of the shop you can buy stamps, weigh your parcels and collect your pension or children's benefits. Often Mums will go to the post office to buy items like stamps and post-cards if they can't get into Ayr because Dad has the car. Sometimes we are sent to collect the family allowance and allowed to buy a mix-up bag of sweets with the change. Ice lollies and canned drinks are popular during the summer. There is a small sign on the outside wall that says, "No bicycles allowed" but no-one takes very much notice of it and we dump our bikes there anyway.
